item.title: Auto cache downloader wont work
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

What you have done is probably .zip the Attentionpk folder with the cache files inside of it instead of going inside the folder and selecting all the files and making it a .zip. Make sure to delete the Attentionpk folder in your C:/ because it did not load properly so when u change the cachedownloader link to the new link and run the client it should load all the files now. Open up the Attentionpk folder that has all the cache files and select them all then right click choose add to archive…(WINRAR), archive file type .zip then upload the cache again and change the link it should load properly now.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto cache downloader wont work

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Sorry, but you’re looking for Client Help

[/quote]
You should stop posting shit like that and actually help him out or not bother posting.

OT: it looks like the server can’t find the file it wants by looking at the console. Do you have a cache called AttentionPK in your C:/ with all the files present?[/quote]
Actually, I am helping. By pointing them to the correct forums, they can actually get help from people that know what they’re doing.
He is having an issue with the cache extracting properly.
Now get off your high horse, Arick.
Seeing as the server help section seems to need the most moderation, and there isn’t a moderator here 24/7. I’m just doing my part.
